div.p: Simple way to create amazing documents for your project.

input.name: q
input.onblur: if (this.value == '') {this.value = 'Looking to ask a question? Write here..';}
input.onfocus: if (this.value == 'Looking to ask a question? Write here..') {this.value = '';}
input.value: Looking to ask a question? Write here..

div.p: Has laoreet percipitur ad. Vide interesset in mei, no his legimus verterem. Et nostrum imperdiet appellantur usu, mnesarchum referrentur id vim.
